channel.title: The Rebellion Report
channel.itunes:subtitle: A High-School Star Wars Podcast
channel.itunes:author: The Rebellion Report
channel.itunes:summary: The Rebellion Report is a podcast about all things Star Wars. Listen to hear our thoughts, opinions, and theories about past, present, and future topics in the Star Wars universe.
channel.description: The Rebellion Report is a podcast about all things Star Wars. Listen to hear our thoughts, opinions, and theories about past, present, and future topics in the Star Wars universe.

item.title: Baby Yoda..... need we say more?
item.itunes:title: Baby Yoda..... need we say more?
item.description:
In this episode, Gracie talks about Baby Yoda, Baby Yoda, and more Baby Yoda. And Toby, Jesse, Stephen, and Jonathan get in a few passing remarks about the first seven episodes of the
Disney+ live-action series, The Mandalorian.
item.content:encoded: In this episode, Gracie talks about Baby Yoda, Baby Yoda, and more Baby Yoda. And Toby, Jesse, Stephen, and Jonathan get in a few passing remarks about the first seven episodes of the Disney+ live-action series, The Mandalorian.

item.title: Palps, Threepio, and all that 60s jazz
item.itunes:title: Palps, Threepio, and all that 60s jazz
item.description:
In this episode, Toby, Jesse, Gracie, and Jonathan talk characters, settings, theories, and the final trailer for the Rise of Skywalker.

item.title: Happy Hogan’s Star Wars
item.itunes:title: Happy Hogan’s Star Wars
item.description: In this episode, we take a look at the teaser for The Mandalorian. This is the final episode of a three part series on the trailers released at Star Wars Celebration: Chicago.
item.content:encoded: In this episode, we take a look at the teaser for The Mandalorian. This is the final episode of a three part series on the trailers released at Star Wars Celebration: Chicago.

item.title: #thatsnotmybane
item.itunes:title: #thatsnotmybane
item.description: Summary: In this episode, we dive deep into the trailer for Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker, revealed at Star Wars Celebration: Chicago. This is the second of a three-part series on the event.

item.title: Freakin’ Ahsoka Tano!
item.itunes:title: Freakin’ Ahsoka Tano!
item.description: In this episode, we go into the full-length trailer for Clone Wars Season 7 revealed at Star Wars Celebration: Chicago. This is the first of a three-part series on the event.

item.title: Jedi Master Dave Filoni
item.itunes:title: Jedi Master Dave Filoni
item.description: In this episode we look at the final episode of Star Wars Rebels, and the trailer for the upcoming additions to the Clone Wars.
